resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

worklogs.comment:
westonpace opened a new pull request, #13639:
URL: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/13639

   Converted `total_batches_` and `batches_processed_` to atomic variables since they are accessed simultaneously by the input received and process threads

issuetype.description: An improvement or enhancement to an existing feature or task.
issuetype.name: Improvement

comments.body:
CC [~icexelloss]

TSAN only runs on our nightly tests so these errors are often missed during CI / PR.  Could you take a look?  You should be able to build and run the test locally with TSAN by providing {{ARROW_USE_TSAN=ON}} as part of the cmake command to generate the cache.  You will need to be using clang.
